main event: Multiple witnesses, including two police officers, reported seeing a large unidentified flying object with bright red lights hovering over Exeter, New Hampshire, on September 3, 1965.
interesting points: The object exhibited intelligent movement, hovering and then disappearing rapidly, at times following police vehicles., The presence of multiple witnesses, including reliable local police officers, adds credibility to the sighting., The object was described as approximately 40-50 feet in diameter, and the lights were remarkably bright., Residents reported similar lights on the same evening, indicating widespread sightings., The incident attracted significant media attention and led to an investigation by the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book.
sighted object: large glowing object with bright red lights
witness description: including two police officers and several local civilians
